column1:
Based  on  an 
infonnation  received  from 
the  arrested  Pakistani  nationals, 
the
team  of Police  Officers  had  proceeded  to  Slave  Island  to  arrest  the  Appellant.
The Appellant was arrested at  12.25  hours while  he  was  inside a three wheeler

parked  at  Wekanda 
road.  Another  person  who  was 
standing  near  a 
three

wheeler  was  also  arrested  with  narcotics.  The  Appellant  and 
the  narcotics

recovered 
from 
the  Appellant  were 
kept 
in 
the 
custody  of  PS 
30204
